Module ing.sw.ouahidi.miah.longhi
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp44.server.controller.states

Class CompoundState

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.psp44.server.controller.states.State
      • it.polimi.ingsw.psp44.server.controller.states.CompoundState
  • public class CompoundState
extends State
    CompoundState extends State. Has simple collection methods (add and remove) Architecture based on the composite pattern (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Composite_pattern)
